summary: Alters the Iron Armor set to look like the set of armor worn by the iconic Dovahkiin shown in the Skyrim trailer and TV commerical.
descriptionHtml:
-update- This mod has been obsoleted; go [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6935]HERE[/url] for the latest version.


This mod simply replaces the graphics for the Iron Cuirass with the Studded Leather Armor, and the Iron Boots and Gauntlets with the Cuffed Steel Boots and Nordic Steel Gauntlets.

The purpose of this mod is simply to allow a character to look like the Dovahkiin shown in the Skyrim trailer and TV commercial, without having to mix-and-match light and heavy armors or use armors from different sets, allowing maximum benefit from skills and perks with minimum investment.

TV commercial used as reference : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w1AenlOEXao

Official Trailer used as reference : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JSRtYpNRoN0
author: QuickFox
